channel.title: ClashX ChangeLog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.description:
• Basic macOS 11 support
  • Clash core update
Sat, 14 Nov 2020 06:58:03 GMTVersion 1.30.4.1 (1.30.4.1)

Build with macOS 11 SDK

Wed, 11 Nov 2020 15:24:53 GMTVersion 1.30.3.2 (1.30.3.2)
  • Update Clash Core, fix potential problems causing enhance mode start fail.
  • Update default built-in dns and fallback-filter in enhance mode, check the log for details. Built-in dns will only take effect when no dns set in the config file.
Wed, 28 Oct 2020 12:52:48 GMTVersion 1.30.3.1 (1.30.3.1)

Update Core Version, better iPV6 supports.

Sat, 24 Oct 2020 12:27:15 GMTVersion 1.30.2.2 (1.30.2.2)

No changelog given

Mon, 05 Oct 2020 13:47:58 GMT
